mapper.select:
select a.*, concat(concat(c.account_name, '('), concat(c.account_num, ')')) as account_info, c_emp.employee_name as create_user_name, u_emp.employee_name as update_user_name, c.account_name, c.id as company_card_id from tab_data_device a left join tab_data_company_account c on a.account_id = c.id and c.status = 1
left join tab_user_info c_user on a.create_user = c_user.id left join tab_employee_info c_emp on c_user.employee_id = c_emp.id
left join tab_user_info u_user on a.update_user = u_user.id left join tab_employee_info u_emp on u_user.employee_id = u_emp.id
where a.status != 0
and a.status = #{status}
and (a.encoding like '%${encoding}%' or a.pos_name like '%${encoding}%')
and c.account_num like '%${account_num}%'
order by a.update_time DESC, a.id DESC

select a.* from tab_data_device a where a.status != 0 and a.city_id = #{city_id}
and (a.device_code like '%${device_code}%' or a.simple_name like '%${device_code}%')
and c.account_num like '%${account_num}%'
order by a.update_time DESC, a.id DESC
select * from tab_data_device device where device.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tab_data_device ( pos_name, encoding, short_post_name, account_id, description, status, update_user, update_time, create_user, create_time ) values ( #{pos_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encoding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{short_post_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{update_user,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{create_user,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update tab_data_device set pos_name = #{pos_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, encoding = #{encoding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, short_post_name = #{short_post_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_id = #{account_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{update_user,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE id = #{id}
update tab_data_device t set t.status = ${status}, update_time=#{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user =#{update_user,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, where t.id in (${ids})
